name: Classic Pedicure
description: A traditional pedicure with nail shaping, cuticle care, soothing foot bath, and nail polish.

name: Gel Pedicure
description: Includes everything in a Classic Pedicure plus a long-lasting gel nail polish application.

name: Deluxe Spa Pedicure
description: An indulgent treatment including foot soak, exfoliation, mask, massage, and polish.

name: Athlete's Foot Treatment
description: Specialized pedicure focusing on foot health, with treatments targeting athlete's foot.

name: Hot Stone Pedicure
description: A therapeutic pedicure using hot stones for massage, improving circulation and relaxation.

name: Express Pedicure
description: A quick fix for your feet, including nail shaping, buffing, and polish application.
